text: [Music]
job interview skills a program to master
the difficult stages and situations in a
job interview step 2 body language
keeping your body language open and
relaxed demonstrates self assurance you
don't have to purge novice Lee on the
edge of your seat to display
attentiveness
but slouching back and placing your
hands behind your neck is not acceptable
either crossing your arms is a definite
no the smile the posture the handshake
produces miraculously relaxed atmosphere
and creates a good impression
hold the handshake for two or three
beats and try to match the other
person's pressure maintain eye contact
during the handshake eye contact as you
speak is very important
don't stare the interviewers down but
you should look at them 65 to 75 percent
of the time while you're answering a
good time to maintain eye contact is
when they are asking the question to
ensure you have picked it up correctly
now let's have a look at some of the
important tips for body language during
an interview walk smart but modestly
from the entrance to the table move your
right hand forward while shaking hand
sit standard in a cross-legged position
maintain a moderate eye contact do not
shake your hands and head aimlessly do
not do anything distractive do not place
your hands on the table
do not lean back on the chair pick up
your papers on receiving signals from
the chairperson stand and thank them
before leaving voice enter with the
favorable and courteous tone control
your voice all the time adjust the
volume of your voice
never speak at the top of your voice do
not rush too much maintain clarity do
not whisper speak with your normal
accent do not try to fake or imitate an
accent this was a demonstration video
for job interview skills for complete
program visit us at let's talk company
dot in if you like this video kindly
share your comments which will encourage
us to make more videos for you you can
also subscribe to our YouTube channel by
clicking subscribe button just above
this video thank you for watching us
take care
[Music]
